name: Run Slime, Run !
description:
You are a slime, and you must run.

The only problem : you only have 10 seconds to live.

Reach the spawners so that your clones can continue where you could not.

And don't hesitate to use your corpses to reach new heights !

---

Game made for the Ludum Dare 51 with the theme "Every 10 Second".

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/run-slime-run
